/* AlimtalkSendStatusMapper.getAlimtalkPeriodSendStatusList */ SELECT hdt.OGN_CD AS ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, SUM(hdt.SMS_CHARGE_AMT) AS SMS_CHARGE_AMT, SUM(hdt.SMS_CHARGE_CNT) AS SMS_CHARGE_CNT, SUM(hdt.ALK_SEND_QTY) AS ALK_SEND_QTY, SUM(hdt.ALK_WAIT_QTY) AS ALK_WAIT_QTY, SUM(hdt.ALK_SUCCESS_QTY) AS ALK_SUCCESS_QTY, SUM(hdt.ALK_FAIL_QTY) AS ALK_FAIL_QTY, SUM(FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('ALK', twuidv01.ORGN_CD) * hdt.ALK_SUCCESS_QTY) AS ALK_SALE_AMT FROM HCS_DDSMS_T hdt, ( SELECT twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_NM, twuidv01.STORE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_NM, (CASE WHEN twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'H' THEN (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD) WHEN twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'S' THEN (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = twuidv01.STORE_CD) ELSE null END ) AS AGENCY_CD FROM ( SELECT DECODE(twuidv01.ORGN_FG, 'A', 'M', twuidv01.ORGN_FG) AS ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_NM, twuidv01.STORE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_NM FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 twuidv01 GROUP BY twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_NM, twuidv01.STORE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_NM ) twuidv01 WHERE 1=1
AND twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeCd} || '%'
AND twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeNm} || '%'
AND twuidv01.STORE_CD LIKE '%' || #{storeCd} || '%'
AND twuidv01.STORE_NM LIKE '%' || #{storeNm} || '%'
GROUP BY twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_NM, twuidv01.STORE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_NM ) twuidv01 WHERE 1=1 AND hdt.SMS_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND twuidv01.ORGN_CD = hdt.OGN_CD AND (hdt.SMS_CHARGE_CNT != 0 OR hdt.ALK_SEND_QTY != 0 OR hdt.ALK_WAIT_QTY != 0 OR hdt.ALK_SUCCESS_QTY != 0 OR hdt.ALK_FAIL_QTY != 0 ) GROUP BY hdt.OGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM ORDER BY hdt.OGN_CD DESC
